column2: @freewrytin God is way too good for Zyrtec
I need Zyrtec. So bad. When did I become cursed with allergies?
And what's worse is that I reached my 3-day limit on the nose spray yesterday, which means I have to rely on Zyrtec.
Time to take some Zyrtec or Allegra or something. I need my voice
Oh my RT @imsydneycharles: I just want it to be on record somewhere that I took Zyrtec and Benadryl together...just in case I pass out
